changeSet.author: ibacher

and.sqlCheck: select 1 from concept_reference_source where name='LOINC' and retired = false
select count(*) from fhir_concept_source where uuid = '249b13c8-72fa-4b96-8d3d-b200efed985e'

changeSet.sql: insert into fhir_concept_source (name, concept_source_id, url, creator, date_created, uuid) select name, concept_source_id, 'http://loinc.org', 1, now(), '249b13c8-72fa-4b96-8d3d-b200efed985e' from concept_reference_source where name = 'LOINC' and retired = false

changeSet.author: ibacher

and.sqlCheck: select 1 from concept_reference_source where name='CIEL' and retired = false
select count(*) from fhir_concept_source where uuid = '2b3c1ff8-768a-102f-83f4-12313b04a615'

changeSet.sql: insert into fhir_concept_source (name, concept_source_id, url, creator, date_created, uuid) select name, concept_source_id, 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.7201', 1, now(), '2b3c1ff8-768a-102f-83f4-12313b04a615' from concept_reference_source where name = 'CIEL' and retired = false

changeSet.author: ibacher
changeSet.sql: update fhir_concept_source set url = 'https://openconceptlab.org/orgs/CIEL/sources/CIEL' where url = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.7201'

changeSet.author: pmanko
changeSet.comment: Create Task table for the Task FHIR resource

changeSet.author: ibacher
changeSet.sql: update fhir_reference set target_uuid = substring(reference from position('/' in reference) + 1)

changeSet.author: ibacher
changeSet.comment: Create the table for storing Diagnostic Reports

changeSet.author: ibacher
changeSet.sql: insert into fhir_observation_category_map (concept_class_id, observation_category, creator, date_created, uuid) select concept_class_id, 'laboratory', 1, now(), uuid() from concept_class where uuid = '8d4907b2-c2cc-11de-8d13-0010c6dffd0f'

insert into fhir_observation_category_map (concept_class_id, observation_category, creator, date_created, uuid) select concept_class_id, 'procedure', 1, now(), uuid() from concept_class where uuid = '8d490bf4-c2cc-11de-8d13-0010c6dffd0f'

insert into fhir_observation_category_map (concept_class_id, observation_category, creator, date_created, uuid) select concept_class_id, 'exam', 1, now(), uuid() from concept_class where uuid = '8d491a9a-c2cc-11de-8d13-0010c6dffd0f'

changeSet.author: ibacher
changeSet.sql: insert into fhir_observation_category_map (concept_class_id, observation_category, creator, date_created, uuid) select concept_class_id, 'laboratory', 1, now(), uuid_in(overlay(overlay(md5(random()::text || ':' || clock_timestamp()::text) placing '4' from 13) placing to_hex(floor(random()*(11-8+1) + 8)::int)::text from 17)::cstring) from concept_class where uuid = '8d4907b2-c2cc-11de-8d13-0010c6dffd0f'

insert into fhir_observation_category_map (concept_class_id, observation_category, creator, date_created, uuid) select concept_class_id, 'procedure', 1, now(), uuid_in(overlay(overlay(md5(random()::text || ':' || clock_timestamp()::text) placing '4' from 13) placing to_hex(floor(random()*(11-8+1) + 8)::int)::text from 17)::cstring) from concept_class where uuid = '8d490bf4-c2cc-11de-8d13-0010c6dffd0f'

insert into fhir_observation_category_map (concept_class_id, observation_category, creator, date_created, uuid) select concept_class_id, 'exam', 1, now(), uuid_in(overlay(overlay(md5(random()::text || ':' || clock_timestamp()::text) placing '4' from 13) placing to_hex(floor(random()*(11-8+1) + 8)::int)::text from 17)::cstring) from concept_class where uuid = '8d491a9a-c2cc-11de-8d13-0010c6dffd0f'
